title: HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company Limited
sample_text:
Policy Wordings
Marine Hull Insurance of Jetties
1.	
Loss, if any, payable to Assured or Loss Payee, as set out 
in the Insurance Schedule
2.	
Insuring Clauses
	
In consideration of the payment of the premium, 
Underwrites hereby agree, subject to the provisions of 
this Policy and the Sum Insured specified in the Schedule 
to indemnify the Assured in respect of:
	
Wider Cover
	
All structural loss or damage to the Jetty (or Pontoons, 
Wharves, etc. as the case may be), cranes and/or DG Set 
fitted thereon, occasioned by or through collision with 
Vessels or any other floating objects, cyclone
